name: Elder

skills.name: Mocking Blow
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%

skills.name: Intercede
skills.raw_description:
Places a 50% [Ally Prote on the most injured ally for 2 turns. Grants an Extra Turn.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Take Vengeance
skills.raw_description:
Places a [Counterattack] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. Heals this Champion by 15%.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
